name: CoffeeShop-BetaDemo
description:
This is my first-ever game upload!

This is a beta demo of a game I started working on a while ago called Coffee Shop. It's a love story about a university student and his rival, that get to know each other throughout days of running into each other, hardships, and drinking hot chocolate at a coffee shop! As you can see it is nowhere near finished but any feedback, motivation, or anything you guys want to share would be greatly appreciated! All the art is a placeholder/subject to change so don't get too attached! In the meantime though, I hope you enjoy it!

CoffeeShop Beta Demo 1.1

Created by Ivette Barger

Cutscene art by Sunnie Medina

Sprite art by CHIBI (https://chibi785.itch.io/)

GUI art by Skolaztika (https://skolaztika.itch.io/)
